group_groupInfoApp_addHealthCheckModal.title: Update health check settings
group_groupInfoApp_addHealthCheckModal.line2: Uri: a path that could be accessed by Health Checker machines
group_groupInfoApp_addHealthCheckModal.line3: Intervals: the frequency health checker machines will follow send request to your system. Suggest using default value
group_groupInfoApp_addHealthCheckModal.line4: Fails: This is a counter, if the times that health checker machine fails to access the health check uri bigger than it, then the machine will be pulled out
group_groupInfoApp_addHealthCheckModal.line5: Passes: This is a counter, if the times that health checker machine succeed to access the health check uri bigger than it, then the machine will be pulled in again

dr.dr_drInfoApp_start: Choose Application ID to start DR
dr.dr_drInfoApp_appid_placeholder: Choose Application ID to start DR...

dr_drInfoApp_comment.title: 注
dr_drInfoApp_comment.line1: 域名本身在IDC间有个流量配比，通过DNS分配，该比例影响域名下的所有应用
dr_drInfoApp_comment.line2: 在(1)的基础上，SLB可以只针对某个单一应用，将该应用原本由IDC A处理的流量转发至IDC B
dr_drInfoApp_comment.line3: 应用集群最终处理的流量比= 域名IDC流量比+SLB应用DR工具配比
dr_drInfoApp_comment.line4: 可用机器个数/所有机器个数

dr_drInfoApp_messages.message1: 当前Group未建立DR关系，请确保当前Group能处理其它Group同样请求的情况下。

dr_drInfoApp_InstructionModal.title: 域名DR策略与SLB应用DR策略的关系
dr_drInfoApp_InstructionModal.line1: 通过DNS，决定域名在IDC间的分配比例，影响域名下的所有应用，即调整此比例，域名下所有应用的流量比例都会被调整
dr_drInfoApp_InstructionModal.line3: 日常IDC间比例分配;网络/线路/IDC/SLB级别故障
dr_drInfoApp_InstructionModal.line5: 对于DR部署的应用，SLB可配置策略，在IDC A接收到请求后，将原本该由A处理的流量转发至IDC B。多应用共享域名时，可只针对单个应用开启，不会影响到同域名下其他应用。
dr_drInfoApp_InstructionModal.line7: 应用级别故障恢复;蓝绿发布
dr_drInfoApp_InstructionModal.line8: 应用集群实际处理的流量比=域名DR策略+SLB应用DR策略

dr_drInfoApp_RightApplyModal.title: Apply Access Right
dr_drInfoApp_RightApplyModal.line1: 该应用的DR权限只提供给应用的Owner和Ops团队。 您不属于已上角色，所以暂时不能操作。是否在此申请权限
